Text.Name: RockBlockBase
Text.Item.FabaoSuffix: Stone, Seal, Stele, Dualjade, Tablet, Tower, Boulder

Text.Name: Item_BrownRockBlock
Text.Desc: Very common brick made from brownstone. Can be used more effectively in crafting, but its Attractiveness is quite poor.

Text.Name: Item_GrayRockBlock
Text.Desc: Brick made from Graystone. Can be used more effectively in crafting, but its Attractiveness is quite average.

Text.Name: Item_MarbleBlock
Text.Desc: Brick made from marble. Can be used more effectively in crafting. Its texture is rather attractive.

Text.Name: Item_JadeBlock
Text.Desc: Brick made from jade stone. Can be used more effectively in crafting.

Text.Name: Item_SkyStoneBlock
Text.Desc: Brick made from Holy Stone. Can be used more effectively in crafting.

Text.Name: Item_LingStoneBlock
Text.Desc: Brick made from spirit stones. Can be used more effectively in crafting.

Text.Name: Item_LingCrystalBlock
Text.Desc: Brick made from Spirit Crystal. Can be used more effectively in crafting.
